meanings.definition: Juvies: informal term for juvenile delinquents
meanings.sent1: The juvies were caught spray painting the walls.
meanings.sent2: The police are looking for the juvies responsible for the vandalism.
meanings.sent3: The juvies thought they could outsmart the law, but they were wrong.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were filled with juvies causing trouble.
meanings.sent5: The community worked together to prevent the juvies from committing crimes.

meanings.definition: Juvies: informal term for juvenile detention centers
meanings.sent1: The juvies were locked up in the detention center for their actions.
meanings.sent2: Visitors are not allowed to bring any items into the juvies.
meanings.sent3: The juvies tried to organize a talent show in the detention center.
meanings.sent4: The juvies felt isolated within the walls of the detention center.
meanings.sent5: The staff at the juvies' detention center worked hard to provide education and support.

meanings.definition: Juvies: informal term for young people or teenagers
meanings.sent1: The juvies were excited to go to the amusement park.
meanings.sent2: The juvies gathered at the park for a picnic.
meanings.sent3: The juvies decided to start a band and practice in the garage.
meanings.sent4: The juvies' laughter echoed through the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The juvies enjoyed spending time together playing sports in the park.
